attributes.additional_details:
Many animals, elderly and vulnerable people suffer from the loudness of fireworks, multiple times throughout the year; every year!

Silent fireworks have shown to be a big success, in many other countries (Eg. Italy) throughout the world.
attributes.background: Please stop or reduce the volume of fireworks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
